_comment: NO EMOJI in i18n values. All icons are rendered as Lucide React components in JSX code.

onboarding.title: AI Cycling Workout Planner Setup
onboarding.subtitle: Intervals.icu integration is required to use this service
onboarding.step1Desc1: Intervals.icu is a powerful free training analysis platform.
onboarding.step1Desc2: This service uses Intervals.icu data to generate AI workouts and register them directly to your calendar.
onboarding.step1NoAccount: Don't have an Intervals.icu account yet?
onboarding.step1Signup: Sign up for free at intervals.icu →
onboarding.step2Inst2: Click Developer in the left menu
onboarding.step2AthleteIdTitle: How to find your Athlete ID:
onboarding.step2AthleteIdHint: Here, i12345 is your Athlete ID.
onboarding.step3CyclingTipDesc: To use generated workouts on your Wahoo, Garmin, or other cycling computer:
onboarding.step3CyclingTipStep3Check: Make sure to check "Upload planned workouts"!
onboarding.step3CyclingTipNote: This option must be enabled for AI-generated workouts to auto-sync to your device.
onboarding.bothRequired: Both Athlete ID and API Key are required.

settings.trainingAutoSync: FTP, max HR, and LTHR are automatically synced from Intervals.icu.
settings.focusDescription: Recovery: TSS -30% / Maintain: Keep current / Build: TSS +10%
settings.excludeBarcodeHint: Recommended for smart trainers with slow ERG response
settings.settingsSaved: All set! Ready to start training
settings.apiGuideTitle: How to Get Your API Key
settings.apiGuideStep3: Copy the key from "API Key" section
settings.apiGuideStep4: Also note your Athlete ID at the top (e.g., i123456)
settings.apiKeySaved: Connected! Your AI coach is ready
settings.weeklyTssHint: Set your weekly TSS target. Leave empty for auto-calculation based on CTL.

weeklyAvailability.title: Weekly Availability
weeklyAvailability.description: Set your available days for workouts. Rest days will not have workouts.

validation.atLeastOne: At least one day must be set as 'Available'.

fitness.title: Today's Condition
fitness.ctlTooltip: Chronic Training Load. Average training volume over the past 6 weeks, representing your current fitness level.
fitness.atlTooltip: Acute Training Load. Average training volume over the past 7 days, representing your current fatigue level.
fitness.tsbTooltip: Training Stress Balance. CTL - ATL value: +10 or higher means well-rested, -10 or lower means fatigue accumulated.
fitness.ctlGlossary: Average training load over the past 42 days, representing your current fitness level. Gradual increases are good, but rapid spikes risk overtraining.
fitness.atlGlossary: Acute Training Load. Average training load over the past 7 days, representing your current fatigue. Higher means more fatigued.
fitness.tsbGlossary: Training Stress Balance = CTL - ATL. General guideline: +10 or above (recovered, ready for intensity) / -10 to +10 (moderate) / -10 or below (fatigued, rest needed). Individual variation exists; observe your own patterns.
fitness.ftpGlossary: Functional Threshold Power. Maximum power sustainable for about 1 hour. Typically estimated from a 20-min test x 0.95, used as the basis for training zones.
fitness.hrvGlossary: Measures relative change from your personal baseline. Higher than usual = good recovery; lower than usual = fatigue/stress signal. Absolute values vary greatly between individuals.

workout.generateFailed: Oops, something went wrong. Try again?
workout.registerSuccess: Perfect! Check your cycling computer now (ID: {{eventId}})
workout.registerFailed: Registration failed. Please check your Intervals.icu connection
workout.emptyTitle: Ready to create your first workout?
workout.emptyDesc: Click the button below to generate today's optimal workout. AI analyzes your CTL, ATL, TSB to recommend the perfect training.

weeklyPlan.title: Weekly Workout Plan
weeklyPlan.generateRateLimit: API rate limit reached. Please try again later.
weeklyPlan.emptyDesc: Generate your entire week's training plan at once. AI creates a 7-day plan aligned with recovery/build rhythm.
weeklyPlan.tssWarningUnachievable: Reaching TSS target {{target}} is unlikely with {{days}} days remaining. Currently {{accumulated}}/{{target}} ({{pct}}%). Adjust target?

admin.userStatsDescMonth: Last 30 days generation count by user ({{count}} users total)
admin.noWorkoutsRecent: No workouts generated in the last 7 days.

landing.heroSubtitle4: AI automatically generates and sends workouts to your cycling computer
landing.problem1:
"What should I ride today?"
Wasting time deciding every day
landing.problem2:
CTL, ATL, TSB...
Have the data but can't use it
landing.problem3:
No tablet/laptop,
just want to ride the trainer...
landing.solutionTitle: AI recommends the optimal workout every day
landing.solutionDesc1: By analyzing your Intervals.icu training data and wellness info,
landing.solutionDesc2: perfectly matched to your current state
landing.step1Desc:
Pulls CTL/ATL/TSB, HRV, sleep data
from Intervals.icu to assess
your current condition
landing.step2Desc:
AI designs today's optimal workout
based on your condition and goals,
automatically
landing.step3Desc:
Workouts auto-sync to your
Wahoo or Garmin cycling computer!
Start training right away
landing.benefit1Desc: Generated workouts are sent directly to your device. Train with just your cycling computer — no tablet or laptop needed!
landing.benefit2Desc: Analyzes your FTP, training load, fatigue, HRV, and more to recommend optimal intensity and volume every day.
landing.benefit3Desc: Auto-syncs with Intervals.icu + Wahoo/Garmin. Connect your smart trainer and start riding.
landing.benefit4Desc: Intervals.icu is free! AI Cycling Coach is free! Start smart training at no cost.
landing.target5: Those tired of daily training decisions
landing.ctaDesc: All you need is an Intervals.icu account to get started
landing.faq1Q: Can I use platforms other than Intervals.icu?
landing.faq1A: Currently only Intervals.icu is supported, but it's free and perfectly syncs with Wahoo/Garmin.
landing.faq2Q: What if I don't like the AI-recommended workout?
landing.faq2A: Use the "Try Different Workout" button to get another option. You can also adjust intensity.
landing.faq3A: Completely free! Intervals.icu free plan is also sufficient.
landing.faq4Q: Can I use it for outdoor road cycling?
landing.faq4A: Absolutely! Indoor/outdoor selection available, power-based training works on Garmin/Wahoo.
landing.faq5A: We only access data through Intervals.icu API. No personal information is stored.
landing.testimonial1: No more daily planning stress. AI adjusts intensity based on TSB, preventing overtraining.
landing.testimonial2: When HRV is low, it automatically recommends easy workouts. No more ignoring body signals.
landing.testimonial3: Workouts sync directly to Wahoo. No tablet needed, just hop on and ride.
landing.before2: Inconsistent fitness due to over/under training
